column2: Reborn is the Arcobaleno's [insert species here] pet
column4:
1 - There's an alien taking a nap on the spaceship's windshield. The Arcobaleno name it Reborn and teach it how to swear in Italian.

2 - Reborn is a dragon. The Arcobaleno have seen weirder shit. Nothing much changes.
column7:
Other story lines within this one:

1. Mammon gets Reborn a collar, which is great because they lose him a lot.

2. Reborn ends up on the Vongola, in his human form, and Tsuna never questions the man's credentials until Verde comes to take him back.

3. Dino is hysterical upon realising that the Arcobaleno have caught themselves a pet Star Parasite.

4. Named after the fact that Reborn usually flies into a star and slurps up all that molten fire for food. His kind have been known to consume entire stars.

5. Reborn also eats a lot of corpses. That is a thing that happens.

6. The Arcobaleno see no problem with any of this.

7. Leon is a human and Reborn immediately loves him.

8. Reborn does lay weird alien eggs, and keeps trying to give them to Leon. It's oddly adorable in a kind of disgusting, horrifying way.

‘No,’ he mumbles out anyways, trying to avert his gaze from the hero staring down at him. ‘’m not cute.’

‘Aw, but you are,’ Yamada-sensei says, and his voice is half-teasing, half-wistful, ‘you almost look just like him, y’know? Back when we were younger.’

‘Oh yeah?’ Hitoshi says, before he can quite catch a hold of his tongue. ‘Should I dye my hair black to match his?’

column4:
In one lifetime, Luo Binghe took Shen Qingqiu as a lowly concubine, where he only ever suffered.

When Luo Binghe is reincarnated, he swears that he will make up for all the pain he caused. If only he could find Shen Qingqiu.

For BingJiu Week 2021.
column6:
hi, so this idea has actually been burning a hole in my brain for a while now. originally i wanted to write this for febuwhump 2021 (lol). when the prompts for bingjiu week came out i thought i could restructure what i'd written to suit it. this was inspired by the webcomic Palace of Bardo (though im eagerly awaiting the last chapters to be published haha).

that being said, i feel like this is a very heavy, very sad fic. i will be posting relevant content notes for each chapter but please take care of yourself.

content notes for this chapter: references to torture, references to major character death (yqy), grief and sorrow, nonconsensual drugging, slavery

this fic probably wont be finished during bingjiu week, i am going through things, but i hope youll be patient and youll enjoy this angst sandwich!

column4:
The Shire is spread out at Bilbo’s feet like a green duvet that stretches out as far as the eye can see. The air is full of birdsong and the indistinct murmur of a small town; conversation, laughter, and squabbling all blending together into a single cohesive whole.

Bilbo stands on young strong legs without thinking and takes three shaking steps away from the polished flagstone that makes up the front step of Bag End.

There is Farmer Maggot driving a herd of geese to market and there, there is Hamfast Gamgee tramping down Bagshot Row looking like a tween again with a flask of Gamgee rotgut poking out his back pocket. He is surrounded by faces and voices he knows, all of whom should be older and altered. Many of which should be dead.

‘Is this the undying land?’ Bilbo wonders and pinches himself. It feels real. It feels too real. If feels… familiar.

Bilbo gets sent back from the Undying Lands for one last try. Sometimes perspective makes all the difference.
column6:
So this is my obligatory canon fix-it fic! 8D

Assume that Bilbo remembers the book and that there were no romantic shenanigans going on whatsoever.
column7: A hinnie is a donkey/horse hybrid where the donkey acts as the mother. They're rarer and harder to breed than mules, but very even-tempered and tiny if your breed the donkey to a pony. Perfect for Hobbits!

column4:
Midoriya Izuku comes from a long line of secret Force users. Reconciling that with living as a Quirkless person in and Quirked world is interesting at best --and that was before his Dad tried to make him commit a murder.

Present Mic and Eraserhead, meanwhile, have been trying to adopt for a while with no luck until Mic walks past the wrong (possibly the right) custody hearing and can't help but step in.

A Boku no Hero Academia and Star Wars Fusion.
column6:
So here is the first bit of that enormous Star Wars crack crossover I promised. It is not actually done, but I have 85K written and am on the last chapter. I think it's safe to start posting. Chapters will go up as I edit them. Enjoy!

Plus, I think all us manga fans could all do with some paternal Aizawa right now. OMG.

FYI, most of my Start Wars knowledge comes from Knights of the Old Republic and Wookiepedia.

column4:
Shen Yuan is reincarnated as a cannon fodder character and eventual murder victim in one of the whodunnit arcs in Proud Immortal Demon Way. Things escalate quickly.

Or: that one where young Luo Binghe’s career goal is ‘Bride’.

---

Shen Yuan shut his eyes as a young man waiting to die in a hospital and opened them again as a wrinkly infant covered in substances best left unimagined.

[Welcome to the System! The System is based on the concept ‘YOU CAN YOU UP. NO CAN NO BB.’ We hope to provide you with a rewarding experience. It is our sincere hope that during the course of your adventure, you can achieve your desire to transform a ‘Stupid Novel’ into a high-end and impressive classic. We pray for your happiness,] a mechanical and inflectionless voice announced over the general hubbub of the group of women handling him. Then it added, somewhat more worryingly, [Error.]

column4:
Two minutes pass before Aizawa taps Midoriya’s face and Midoriya doesn’t respond in the slightest. They don’t have time to wait any longer. 

Aizawa looks up at Todoroki, and tries to say with the least amount of callousness possible, “He won’t make it until the medical team gets here.”

Todoroki’s breath hitches, but his voice is still hard when he insists, “Yes he will.”
column6:
sometimes you don't write anything for several months and then god comes down from the sky and possesses you during finals week and you have no other choice

cw: hospitals, semi-detailed descriptions of blood and wounds, panic attacks, brief (BRIEF) mention of suicidal ideation, emetophobia warning, a bit of implied/referenced child abuse because...endeavor's whole situation but he doesn't show up don't worry, also the title's just artsy from i get no joy by jade bird and it doesn't mean anything because i'm a dyke and i can do whatever i want
column7:
aizawa really does have that mom panic instinct that makes him briefly strong enough to lift a car or whatever the fuck but god i wish he would take a nap more often

 

thanks for reading...i love u

column2: All Old Things are New Again
column4:
Full-time necromancer and part-time cam boy, Wei Wuxian, finds himself unexpectedly homeless. An enthusiastic patron comes to his rescue.

Conversely:

Immortal Cultivator Lan Wangji has been waiting a long time for his deceased husband to be reincarnated again. In retrospect, he should have anticipated that this is how it would go.
column6: Ironically I started writing this before Britany Spear's conservatorship was quite as big in the news cycle as it presently is. It was around, but not like it is right this second. Her story absolutely influenced Moxuanyu's.
column7:
There are three ways this could have gone down on LWJ’s side:
LZC: Wangji, I have good news and I have odd news.
LZC: The good news is that I may have a lead on Wuxian.
LZC: The odd news is… well, here’s the link.

From there...

1. LWJ saw WWX’s channel and thought ‘Oh good, I’ve found my missing husband and here is a way to force him to accept support until we’re back together because if I know nothing else about him, he’s probably in over his head as we speak.’

2. He got onto the chat, saw WWX waxing enthusiastic about this new sex toy off his wishlist, and then went into a feral seme blackout when he heard WWX say thank you in The Sexy Voice AND say somebody else’s name. He didn’t come down off it until several hours later by which point he’d become WWX’s dedicated and exclusive patron of custom content and had spent something like $500 on random Amazon shit from that wishlist because he didn’t realize right away that he was the only one who could see it anymore and that ended up becoming a whole other Situation™.

or

3. #2 is what happened, but #1 is how he justified it to himself later.

A List of Things Lan Zhan Has Had to Google Because of Something His Online Sugar Baby Said in Passing:

1. Is BAE an acronym? (It is; ‘before anyone else’ and he agrees with the sentiment.)
2. What is ‘Bi-furious’?
3. Power bottom (Self explanatory, it turned out, but he’d wanted to confirm.)
4. Amazon lockers (What is the capacity, how secure are they, are there any in bad parts of town?)
5. Kink negotiation (this one sent him down a BDSM etiquette rabbit hole for two days and left him Realizing Some Things about himself and his husband.)
6. Yeet? (The explanation clarified nothing.)
7. Ethics of patronizing online sex workers. (He broke several of these rules as it turned out, but consoled himself that his situation was somewhat unique. The rest seemed to be common courtesy.)
8. Jail for Gege (Jail for Mother! Jail for a thousand years!)
9. ‘Fuck around and find out’? (A good one. He used it in conversation once and one of the juniors nearly fainted.)
10. Bad Dragon
11. ‘Then perish’? (He has not found an occasion to use this, but is ready.)
12. Men’s engagement rings.

column4:
Yoga Instructor Luo Binghe makes an ill advised bet with his employee to prove that he is not a sex addict and can stop sleeping with the hot clients whenever he wants.

Then Shen Yuan walks in.

---

What walked into his studio was the physical embodiment of every secret bisexual leaning Binghe had ever had, condensed into one delicately boned man in prAna compression leggings and loose tank top with the sides cut open to reveal tantalizing glimpses of his rib cage and the barest hint of a pair of pink areolas. The man looked up at Binghe with soft black eyes behind his round glasses that just made them look even bigger. His thin, soft-looking lips curved up in a smile.

Binghe felt his own grin freeze.

“I’m Shen Yuan, I’m here for your three o’clock one-on-one?”

“Great!” Binghe’s mouth said, while his brain continued to buffer. “Go ahead and get your mat set up while I check something in front. I’ll be right back.”

He let himself out of the solo studio and caught Hualing’s eye over by the counter. “I’ll bring your money in the morning, bitch.”

---

Or: that one where an ethical slut catches feelings

column6:
This is my submission for the 2021 Scum Villain Fic Exchange! I had a ton of fun with the prompt.

"I would like to have a gift with binggeyuan (luo bingge x shen yuan, modern version) as explicit content if possibly (? only them in a modern au with Shen Yuan practicing yoga and bingge being his coach. I just want Shen Yuan in tight leggings being fucked by bingge"

Hope this meets your expectations!
column7:
SY walks into that studio and suddenly feels the need to spend $500 on slutty athletic clothes.

--

Safe to say LBG doesn't know what bachelor food is.

LBG: I didn't even do a sake brine on the shrimp! They were frozen! I defrosted them in the sink! LIKE AN ANIMAL

--

LBG, suddenly develops personal physical boundaries: ...what is that? What IS that???

Ge, normal people like being touched by someone trying to pressure them into a relationship either.

---

SY's booty call was SQH. Imagine angry nerd sex, but then MBJ happened and that was the end of that.

---

LBH, starting a sexual encounter as Bingge and ending it having permanently transitioned into Bingmei.

---

In twenty years, any time LBH uses an airfryer…

“Kids, did I tell you about the time…?”

“YES, please can we just once have chicken nuggets without you telling the story?”

“No.”

---

Pose Reference for those of use who don't remember the Sanskrit, more or less in order:

Halasana: Plow Pose (get it?)

Parvsa Sukhasana: Easy Seat/Lotus, side stretch variation

Mandukasana: Frog Pose

Uttana Shishosana: Puppy Pose

Savasana: Corpse Pose

Chakravakasana: Cat/Cow flow

Bitilasana: Cow Pose

Marjaryasana: Cat Pose

Bharmanasana: Table Top Pose

Balasana: Child's Pose

column4: The long transition from Bing-ge to Bing-mei as observed by one very confused transmigrator turned reluctant courtesan.

column6:
I have never written any kind of fanfiction before (or done any kind of creative writing, really). This was mostly the product of an idea holding me hostage at 3am and refusing to let me sleep. Posting your own writing on the internet for the world to read really is wildly embarrassing lol

I don't know much about Chinese culture, especially concerning naming conventions. I apologize if anything is glaringly wrong! You're welcome to let me know. (I'll go ahead and admit to using modern timekeeping units...)

I mentioned it in the tags, but just note that the anatomy here is a little different since this is abo.
column7:
This is a crazy abo au where SJ and YQY actually make up as disciples, so by the time they're peak lords they've been together for a while. Everyone's way nicer here than they ever would be in canon lol

In this world LBH's adoptive mother never got sick, so LBH stays with her and they have a perfectly happy, normal life where nothing bad happens ever.

EDIT: Just fixed some grammar....tenses are hard.

how to count from one to ten and save your best friend from yourself; qijiu, pre-canon, canon compliant
column6:
IT'S BEEN MONTHS SINCE I'VE PROPERLY WRITTEN but qijiu week launched and i got really excited. then i started crying. This was only meant to be a warm-up to get myself back in the groove but next thing I knew it was 8k.

CONTENT WARNING: depictions of child abuse, implied and explicit sexual abuse of a minor, emotional manipulation/gaslighting, graphic torture (see end note for details)

I also have a mini playlist for this fic in the end notes. Each section begins with a chengyu couple that begins with the numbers one through ten, the meanings of which are also in the end notes. The Chinese version of some bits of dialogue are also included in the fic itself for a bit of djnfjdfjd bilingual spice.
column7:
CW: Section 3 has QJL physically abusing SJ and imposing on SJ's personal space with sexual undertones. He objectifies SJ and binds SJ with silks. SJ is explicitly in pain. In Section 4, SJ dresses up like he's been raped and makes himself bait for WYZ's targets. Strange men converge on him and discuss gangbanging him, but it's ambiguous whether or not they succeed. SJ kills all of them and mutilates their bodies. The entire situation is coercive and SJ is underage, but WYZ puts the onus of the idea on him. It's implied that SJ has done this before when he was even younger. Section 7 features original!LBH torturing SJ per canon. Additionally, SJ gets hard from a dream about YQ and LBH mocks him for it, implying he had to have been torturing YQ in the dream to get off.

Chengyu:
1. 一字千金 // 一言九鼎 - "One word is worth a thousand gold pieces" meaning somebody's input is of incredible value // "One speech is worth [insert high court honor here]" meaning somebody's word is of incredible gravitas
2. 二人同心 // 二龍騰飛 - "Two people share the same heart," self-explanatory // "Twin dragons flying" meaning the celebration of having achieved greatness in life
3. 三從四德 // 三跪九叩 - "Three obediences and four virtues," as mentioned in the text with its own wikipedia page if you're interested in learning more // "Three kneelings and nine kowtows" meaning the most deferential prostration to practice
4. 四通八達 // 四海為家 - "Four ways to get through and eight ways to get there" meaning incredible mobility via social fluency (and always makes me think of "Eponine, she knows her way around") // "The four oceans are my home" meaning someone who wanders with little burden of belonging
5. 五日一石 // 五內如焚 - "One stone in five days" meaning artistry of incredible patience, as in taking five days to draw a single stone // "As if five organs are burning" meaning to be incredibly unwell and feverish
6. 六塵不染 // 六神無主 - "Unsullied by the six dusts," as mentioned in the text // "the Six senses are unmastered" meaning being really out of it and unfocused
7. 七情六慾 // 七損八傷 - "Seven emotions and six desires" // "Seven damages and eight injuries" (both are self-explanatory)
8. 八抬大轎 // 八拜之交 - "Eight-carriage sedan chair" meaning the most honorable carriage for a bride on her wedding day // "Friend of eight bows" meaning sworn siblings
9. 九死不悔 // 九九歸一 - "Nine deaths and no regrets" meaning I'll die on this hill // "Ninety-nine returns to one" meaning everything returns back to the beginning, ashes to ashes dust to dust
10. 十全十美 - "Ten perfections/ten accomplishments" meaning absolute perfection and absolute fulfillment

Mini-playlist (+translated lyrics)
Purple by Tanya Chau (cover by Guo Qin)
Waking Up by Na Ying (cover by Joker Xue and GAI)
Unbreakable Love + Disappeared Lover by Shan Yichun and Tia Ray

whew...anyways, I'm on Tumblr. Thank you amazing Qijiu week 2021 organizers, I'm so excited for all the content.

column2: One Does Not Simply Graduate UA
column4:
By the time they graduate, Aizawa Shouta’s Class A is already the talk of the hero world.

The graduating class 3A is expected to spread out into the world and continue to make waves. To join hero agencies across Japan, maybe even overseas.

In the eyes of the public, the media, the world, the heroes of graduating class 3A are legends.

They are 18 years old.

In which even graduation can't stop Eraserhead from being there for his students and the hero world will probably suffer for it.

Way different vibe with this one though, like it started out serious and then I needed more words so it ended up being crack. It's a complete mess in other words.

Enjoy!
column7:
5000 yen = around $50/£40/40€ rounded

God I hope this is funny. I thought it was but I've accepted my sense of humour is not the greatest over the years.

Non-betad, all mistakes are microsoft's for not having a better spelling and grammar check on their documents.

I'm not sure if I'm going to add more chapters to this, hence why listed as complete. I've been trying to write more for it because I said I'd make it a series but I just haven't been able to, so I thought I'd at least publish this much as a thank you for all the kind words and support I've been getting on Lightning Child. I really didn't expect it to get as much love as it has, so thank you!!!

column4:
“This is nothing,” Shouta says to the class, trying to sound as flat as possible. “Please go back to studying.”
“You’re crying,” Asui says into the heavy quiet.

 

Shouta gets hit with the worst quirk he could possibly think of. On the bright side, his family loves him. And his eyes haven’t been this hydrated in about fifteen years.

column4:
The same day Dabi burns Hawks' wings, searing his quirk away forever, Hawks prematurely gives birth to the son he hadn't realized he was pregnant with.

Hawks has difficulty adjusting to his new life as a civilian stuck on the ground, especially with a troubled preemie to raise, but the winds are always changing, and somehow he'll have to relearn how to fly.

Edit 9/21/21: An important announcement concerning updates has been added to the top AN of chapter 18.
column6:
I've watched the anime to the end of season 4 and have somewhat of an idea what the manga has been doing lately. If there's mistakes in this fic that don't line up with information revealed in the manga, that's why. (Also, I sincerely hope Hawks doesn't lose his wings for real in canon. Or dies.)

Also, because I'm not sure I got this adequately across in the tags, this is an angsty fic. Trouble will occur. Dabi and Hawks have essentially "broken up" and won't get back together for a while, and their baby is...definitely going to be difficult for Hawks down the road. While I do promise a happy ending and fluff, this is not a cutesy, family fic.

Warning for mentions of possible infant death ahead.
column7:
I started writing this on May 1st. I'm currently writing chapter seven. I won't spoil the leaks for 271, but I've seen them, and I'll just say: this fic is absolutely canon divergence and I won't be changing it to comply with each new chapter that comes out. I have no idea what happens next in canon, but it won't affect the progress of this fic. (But uh, yeah, I hope Hawks' wings grow back and he doesn't die!)

This will probably update two or three times a week, depending on how quickly I finish the later chapters. It'll probably be ~15 chapters long.

(Oh, yeah, and I should add: I like Endeavor's redemption arc so far. He's asshole, but he's a redeemable asshole and I believe he truly feels sorry for Touya's death, however he died, and wants to do better for his family. He won't appear often in this fic and I'm not going to dismiss what he did to his family, but if you can't stand a redeeming Endeavor, this isn't the fic for you.)

column4:
Todoroki gets zapped by a Quirk that effectively lowers someone's inhibitions, and Aizawa deals with the strange, humorous, heart-breaking fallout.

The train ride back is something of a nightmare. Not because it goes badly, or because something awful happens, but because Aizawa can’t get rid of this feeling in his chest every time he sees Todoroki’s unusual, carefree smile. He looks like nothing has ever hurt him.
column6:
Happy New Year! I don't have anything preachy to say, but I am very grateful for anyone that's given my fics a chance this year, and I hope you all take care of yourselves, and I hope this next year is a little easier on us all!

So there's a little bit of light angst here, and references towards Todoroki's home-life, but for the most part this is supposed to be light-hearted fun! I'm not sure if that entirely came across. I rated it T for those mentions and also for some swearing. It's set in some nebulous third year time period where everything is fine and the current manga arcs don't exist.

Enjoy! <3
column7:
Literally the only reason I wanted to write this is because Todoroki is already a bit of a blunt character. I don't think he's as socially stunted as he's often portrayed, but he always seems to hold back. I kind of just wanted some funny scenes of him maybe not doing that. And also poking Bakugou into a rage, because that seems like it would be a favourite hobby of his. Anyway, thank you for reading! I hope you enjoyed it!! <3

I should make this a series of 'Aizawa taking care of his hell class,' haha!

column2: area cryptid upset no one bothered to inform him of his tragic backstory
column4:
“My life is a nightmare,” Dabi muttered blankly.

“Nah, this is hilarious,” Hawks said, and while he wasn’t explicitly laughing, Dabi knew that those weird little chirps he was letting out were pointed at him. “Imagine if we go through all this effort and you don’t even have some sort of dramatic background or tragic backstory to justify you being this emo, you’re just a hot topic junkie or something.”

“That’s fucking worse.”

Or,

Dabi has amnesia and keeps reading conspiracy theories about himself in an attempt to figure out who he is, gets the League in on it, and they dismantle organized crime, revolutionize society, and ravage the hero system in the process. Hawks suffers.

column4:
“Here’s how this is going to work,” he said to her a low voice. “I am going to watch you open a new needle before it goes anywhere near my arm or this,” he gestured between the two of them, “isn’t happening. I’m not gonna get fucking sepsis because of you.”

Toga looked at Dabi for a long moment before sweeping her gaze across the rest of the League, who hurriedly returned to what they were doing prior to Dabi’s entrance in a vague attempt to cover up their blatant eavesdropping.

or,

The League isn't sure if Dabi is just a clean freak or what, but it's definitely weird. He's actually immunocompromised, but that thought never really crossed their minds until it was too late.

column4:
The way that Hawks' eyes had flashed when a villain got Dabi in the side with a switchblade… Dabi's cock throbs just thinking about it. All Hell broke loose after that, and before Dabi knew it, he was standing in the middle of an abandoned warehouse littered with corpses. 

He's never seen this side of Hawks before. He's seen glimpses of it, sure, like when Hawks tears into a tray of raw chicken, or in those clips online of him getting really into the zone during a fight. None of that holds a candle to this though. 

"Hawks—" Dabi chokes out, unsure what he even means to say after that. It doesn't matter though, as Hawks growls, bracing himself on Dabi's shoulders to start bouncing on his cock in earnest. Anything else Dabi might have said goes out the window, along with any semblance of coherent thought as he throws his head back with a deep groan.

column4:
After Hawks spams every hero and hero administrative staff in Japan with his daughter's girl scout cookie link, Dabi vows revenge on the too-hot-for-his-own-good hero. After all, *his* daughter is also selling cookies.

Soon a bet is made--whoever's daughter sells fewer cookies has to wear the other's merch in an interview.

Will they stop thirsting over each other long enough to make it through cookie season?

***

Featuring cookie booth shenanigans, an Enji who is willing to play tea party, Touya thirsting over Keigo's biceps, and a Keigo who'd die happy suffocated by Touya's tits
column6:
Soooooooo... This fic was born of my exasperation with the third girl scout cookie season in a row to be FUBAR'd (I'm a leader). And because I pictured Hawks wearing the "Man Enough to Be a Girl Scout" merch.

I present to you single dads Keigo and Touya, who go to war over whose kid can sell more cookies. It's total crack taken seriously. Have fun with it.

 

Unrelated---I'm the cookie cupboard for my troop, which means I'm constantly getting text messages asking me for cookies, and then we arrange a time for them to pick them up. I think this is what it's like to be a drug dealer..
column7:
I slipped in all nine cookie types. I'm stupidly proud of that.

I hope you had fun. Leave a comment with what made you laugh or come talk to me on Twitter at @Kat_the_PQ

column4:
"I keep having these stupid bird instincts around you. And I guess I've been...courting you? So, sorry I've been weird," he says all in a rush. Touya does not know how he's supposed to react to a statement like that. He falls back on teasing, because sarcasm has gotten him this far in his life and he's not about to abandon it now.

"Aww, you want to build me a nest?" Actually, the thought of that is pretty cute. He spends a moment imagining Keigo bringing him sticks.

"I want to mark you as mine," Keigo fucking growls, and when he looks up at Touya his golden eyes are fierce and intense. Touya's blood rushes south so fast he feels lightheaded.

"Holy shit," Touya manages to say.
_____

Keigo acquires a friend (with benefits) and then starts having weird bird instincts. Since they're different from what he's learned about before, he decides to do some research.

Everything gets embarrassing really fast.
column6:
Enormous thank you to hisen, my platonic soulmate and beta-reader. If you scream at me I know I'm doing it right.

I haven't written fiction in at least five years, and this is my first time writing these characters and this fandom. Please be gentle!

Edit: Almost 400 kudos! Oh my goodness, thank you so much. I never expected this to get such a positive response. For the record, I am writing more, because the ideas won't stop happening. Also, I read every comment and they make me smile every time (even the super short ones).
column7:
In this AU the Commission is still involved in Keigo’s life but decided to let him go to school like a normal kid because socialization will help him get used to crowds and different personalities. Because of that, they have a lot less control over him than in canon. He still has evaluations every so often but they’re not actively training him since he’s in a hero program.

I took liberties with the bird behaviors, but like most fics where a specific species is referenced, I based it on the Red-Tailed Hawk (with some additions from other species of hawks and eagles). I tried so hard with the bird stuff, I’m sorry if I’m wrong about anything. They are so weird and complicated.

My thought re: Keigo’s metabolism is that he has a high birdlike metabolism but because he doesn’t have feathers all over there’s not much to keep the heat in except his clothes. Bird body temperatures drop sharply when they’re inactive so that would be even worse for him. Kind of like how fit-but-skinny people will get cold because of a lack of body fat, but more extreme.

Touya is the type to stress-sleep and Keigo is the type to stress-not-sleep. I am, sadly, both of them.

Touya is now in Keigo’s phone as “Damn” and whenever he gets a text from him it sends him into hysterics seeing it on the screen (Keigo is in Touya’s phone as “Pigeon”)

I would love to hear what you thought! What was your favorite scene? Is there anything you wanted to know more about?

You can also find me on:
twitter and tumblr

column4:
Aizawa fixes the villain Dabi with a deadpan glare.

“So you’re telling me that you are Todoroki Touya. And you are here,” Aizawa heaves a heavy sigh. “To visit Todoroki Shouto. For family day.”

Dabi nods. The man is wearing a normal civilian outfit and a surprisingly convincing red wig. Honestly, Aizawa might've even fallen for the disguise…if it weren’t for the distinctive scars and surgical staples.

Seriously. They’re a dead giveaway.

“Sorry, I can’t let you in,” Aizawa says. He can’t believe he has to say this. “Since you are clearly the villain Dabi. That would be a violation of security and safety regulations.”

column4: Izuku's life is going amazingly well, with his Twitch channel where he streams himself playing video games and discussing the nerdiest things imaginable hitting 3 million followers, his best friend as his roommate, and his other close friends as tight-knit as they've been since high school. The only possible road bump is his viewer's continuous demands to know who "Kacchan" is - thanks to Katsuki often coming into his room during streams and Izuku's repeated attempts to pull him into video game competitions - and, more importantly, if they're dating. Which is crazy.

column4:
Izuku is long-suffering Personal Assistant to #1 Pro Hero Dynamight.

Dynamight can't keep a PA to save his career. They all quit crying after a few days weeks. Enter: Izuku—with enough money problems to brave the jaws of the cranky beast. Childhood friend turned glorified paid slave. Somehow it all works out.

‘Kill them with kindness’, his mom had told him once. If that were true, Bakugou Katsuki would be stone-cold dead by now.
column6: Readers beware: there be long, rambly sentences and a profusion of punctuation marks.
column7:
This was written as a sort of experiment. I wanted to ramble on about ideas without interrupting myself for 'pacing' or 'narrative structure' issues and do minimal edits. This is written the way it sounds in my head—as you can see, my mind rambles quite a lot and is prone to go off-tangent sksjdksjdks. So if you do find the story too wordy and unwieldy, maybe move on and don't tell me anymore—you've been warned, and it would only make me cry (I'm a horrible crybaby).

There is a plot somewhere. But it's secondary to BKDK just living their lives and trying not to stab each other. With a spoon.

I hope you enjoyed it anyway. I have been posting story updates in another platform every 2.5k to 3k words. It's FREE to read. Part IV is up that I didn't make part of this chapter. I'll transfer them to AO3 as the word count grows.

Follow me on Twitter. I've been posting a lot of fics there, too.

column4:
Liu Qingge and Shen Qingqiu are accidentally transferred deep into the demon realm by an ancient relic. Well, the relic did what it was supposed to. That two sworn enemies were transferred when one touched the relic carelessly with the other trying to stop him – okay, less ‘accident’, more ‘sudden’.
At least the equally ‘sudden’ favor from this powerful demon might keep them alive long enough to get out of here … maybe that thought was too optimistic.
---
Aka, LQG and SJ have to guard their self-proclaimed bodyguard from all the demons who want some.
SY: … … fml
column7:
I dunno, I just kind of wanted SJ and LQG simping over idiot-energy SY.
I decided not to do the Liushen gift exchange because that sort of thing isn’t a format I’m particularly good at, but I thought I’d do something for xmas, and a ShenLiuShen-wich seemed like a good idea for some reason. Although I guess this ones more of a JiuYuanLiu-wich…

Why am I starting mid-November? Xmas decorations have been in stores since mid-October, it’s fine. Also, I’m not exactly certain how long this is going to be… it should be short(er), but my track record is… … …

column4:
Nedzu isn't fond of many humans, but he was rather fond of strategy games, one of which led him to meet a rather curious and interesting human with the username of "Greenbean." He found himself looking forward to their games, until one day, he got a shocking realization that Green was not only a child, but a bullied one, and suddenly he had someone to protect.

And if he taught the child how to take over the world in the process, well, he was Nedzu, after all.

column2: we're just here alone (i better find you first)
column4:
Dabi stumbles past him, bumping into the wall and turning to him with a strange expression on his face. The door shudders in its frame as it closes behind him. Hawks takes a deep breath- the first one he’s had all day, it feels like- because Dabi is in front of him, unhurt, and there is a clear barrier between the two of them and the others.

Or: Hawks gets hit by a bullet that enhances the neatly buried parts of his animalistic quirk. Dabi is the recipient of his, uh, desire.

column4: Yue Qingyuan is granted a chance to have his heart's deepest desire made real by a mysterious goddess living in a small sect's private temple.
column7:
My very first Qijiu fic! Where everything happens according to Airplane-level plot contrivances. Honestly whether or not there was a goddess or its an alternate universe/lost memories type of scenario is up for interpretation. Enjoy!

In my opinion writing Qijiu is a master lesson in miscommunication and misunderstandings and also interestingly about power dynamics. I mean that in the sense that for the relationship to work (in my opinion) and for any hope of successful communication between them the power dynamics have to be balanced extremely carefully. The power that each person individually holds has to be almost equally weighted to prevent them from hurting each other (though it's less onerous on Shen Jiu's side). I feel like it's summed up best in the fact that Yue Qingyuan is great at loving Shen Jiu but not good at looking after him and if Shen Jiu felt an inch more insecure he would clam up and never say another half-honest word again. However, in this world Shen Jiu is living his best life! He's truly so happy! He has Yue Qingyuan which is something that he's always wanted and his cultivation is doing good and he's a powerful Peak Lord having a good time. Only good things for Shen Jiu.

Yue Qingyuan is a whole mess. He's so interesting because he's genuinely a good person but so riddled with self-doubt and self-hatred and very understandable trauma that it ends up circumventing all of those good impulses. This is especially true when it comes to his relationship with Shen Jiu and what he believes the other truly wants, he's reading it all wrong! His perspective is a mess and a very interesting lens with which to examine Shen Jiu because he both venerates the other and also (somewhat unconsciously) believes the worst in him. Shen Jiu is (paradoxically maybe) a much simpler character in that his wants and desires correspond more easily to his actions. This fic is a great example of soft Shen Jiu, the softest you'll ever find him!

As always thank you so much for reading and I really hope you enjoyed it!

(Btw the title is from Geyser by Mitski!)

column4:
“What would you like?” Death/Life asked thoughtfully, their voice familiar and unfamiliar and a thousand different cadences all at once. They sounded like his Mother. Like Hermione. Like Ron. Like Professor Dumbledore. Like Stan Shunpike. Like Hagrid. Like the welcome witch at St Mungos.
“I would like a family,” he decided absently. “I would like to be loved.”
“I can do that,” Death/Life said, a smile in their voices.

 

Harry Potter was reborn to a loving mother with three amazing older sisters. And lost it all thanks to his father. Determined to find them all, he makes his way to Cang Qiong Mountain Sect where he is recruited into Qiong Ding Peak. But in both lives, Harry Potter is a nosy little bastard, and it isn't long before he's ferreting out all those secrets that no one ever wanted him to find.

column2: Give an inch, take a mile
column4:
Yue Qingyuan finds himself in a dream and, without giving it much thought, he lets himself get carried away by the events that proceed. Enraptured by what he has forbidden himself to think about or act upon, he only sinks deeper and deeper.

"Ah..." Yue Qi sighed dreamily. "Xiao Jiu receives his Qi-ge's fingers very well, I'm very happy"
column5: [['A translation ofGive an inch, take a mile by Lagart0.', ['Give an inch, take a mile', '/works/33395254'], ['Lagart0', '/users/Lagart0/pseuds/Lagart0']]]
column6:
This translation of my original work in spanish wouldn't be in any way possible without the help of Chuck (draws qijiu, just saying) and deviantkyme (also draws qijiu, go also to love it), I would not have do this translation without their help and support.

First Day: Dreams

[Edited: 2021/10/24]
column7:
[1] Gao Shan Liu Shui is a song that metaphorises how difficult it is to meet a friend who understand you and appreciates (source; the Internet). The legend says that the composer wrote the song near a river, where he met a fisherman who understood his music perfectly. They became friends and promised to meet the following year in the same place, but the fisherman died and the composer mourned the death of someone who understood him.

[2] Explanation (and more personal headcanon); generally a pure meaning is attributed to 'Xiao Jiu' as it is an affectionate nickname to refer to a minor among family or friends. And, that is what YQY attributed and wants to attribute to it, but the problem rise in adulthood when it become a possessive nickname. In PIDW/SVSSS only YQY (and MTXT, but she calls him jiumei) is SJ's older brother; even the order of the peaks makes it so (SJ is second). And, subliminally, YQY has begun to use the nickname not just as a way of 'trying to connect to SJ' but as 'something that belongs only to him from SJ' Corrupt, isn't it? Possessive and, naturally, YQY tries to deny it because as a 'big brother' (platonically speaking about their bond) he shouldn't have such 'incestuous' thoughts, but they are still there. Xiao Jiu keeps referring to a bond, what YQY doesn't want to accept, is one that he no longer feels.

[3] 20 kilometres/12,4 miles

[4] From here on, mostly all the dialogue is from canon, between the Wattpad version and the English translation I found. Naturally arranged for the situation, but still there.

[5] Words spoken by Shen Jiu in his extra when he and YQY are in the Ling Xi Caves.

[6] A mistake was made in the original work, the Ling Xi Caves visit happens when they are already peak lords.

[7] 得陇望蜀: Metaphor of insatiable greed.

You trying to convince me that I should put the OOC tag for YQY: Listen!

Me arguing that YQY has a lot of traumas and is probably unstable inside: No, you listen to me, this guy almost had to die before communicating what anyone would have said the moment they saw Shen Jiu, and he sleeps, lives and works near the place he was locked up for more than year daily. Look at him! [Yue Qingyuan pressing both 'guilt' and 'love' buttons]

In few words, this scenario is possible because it's a dream and, thanks to feel secure to express himself without no one knowing, YQY is free (with, obviously, his traumas also there) to do as he wants— which is fucking SJ and apologize to him. This just Yue Qi enjoying himself and not giving a fuck to the flags of 'This could be a dreamscape' he has been looking and saying 'This is bit weird' because cold world, SJ's hole warm

To sum up what happens after, SJ has a sincere conversation with YQY because he is a man of action. Mostly motivated for the feeling of betrayal that the revelation gives him and questions he wants answers but, also, because SJ has finally an epiphany. Angry with all the situation, he asked 'Why YQY suffers and make suffer others?' and 'Why lying?' which ends up in 'I also do that, I don't want to live like this anymore' and SJ just can't let YQY rotten himself like this because he loves him, and he has seen YQY loves him but doesn't know how to do it; because loving is easy but doing correctly (or know how to) is hard. So, YQY is confused af at the begging, but they decide to try his best together and...that helps, it is not everything, but the thing about healing, it just needs to work sometimes. It's a process.

No, they don't fuck at that moment, it would take them time, but they will. However, not that much of time, YQY has now another problem, that he can't....enjoy the SJ of his dream because he feels guilty, so his horny himself will start barking in the daylight because he has seen naked SJ, and you can't forget that easily —same thing with SJ. YQY is like Vang Gogh; but he doesn't paint, he uses wet dreams to cope with his depression and love. They will end up fucking in YQY's office.

YQY having a conversation and bonding with SJ:
YQY's mind: His dick looks cute
YQY: stop

[BTW, for spanish readers who happen to read both version (Why? I am blushing) they will have noticed that they are bit different and with more content; that's because writing YQY is fun as hell and with the two beautiful souls that I had like betas I've seen things that need to be fixed or improved- the...15th probably I will update the spanish version. Yes, it will add all this things, It will be more difficult to not write it differently though.]

column2: Have I Told You About Minnie?
column4: After you’ve known Matches Malone long enough, you get used to him telling you about his kids. Not that his kids know about it.
column6: When I was writing "One Night" about a year ago, I threw in a little gag that amused myself that Steph had a fake ID for "Minnie Malone," and ended up making a post on Tumblr about it, which people seemed to enjoy. So I decided that I was going to actually write the story about it. As such, this is technically in the same universe as the Night'verse, but only in the broadest sense of things.
column7: If you want more of my stuff, I'm @secretlystephaniebrown over on Tumblr, where prompts are open in these times of social distancing.

column4: How Shang Qinghua accidentally derails the plot, makes a friend and eventually saves the world.
column5: [['For Nemainofthewater.', ['Nemainofthewater', '/users/Nemainofthewater/gifts']]]
column6: Thank you B for beta-ing!
column7:
A miscellaneous collection of things that didn't make it into the main plot.

A peek into what's going on in Shen Qingqiu's mind:
- What?（⊙ｏ⊙） Who would've expected SQH to hold such thoughts. Hmm. Of course, I'm the best. Interest peaked.
- He smiled at me! He looked happy to see me! o(*°▽°*)o Hmm. Suspicious. ಠ_ಠ Must investigate more.
- Hmm Shang-shidi has some hidden depths... Did I make a friend?
- Ha look at this Qi-ge, I have a friend! （￣～￣）
- Of course, it couldn't last. With Qi Qingqi's warning, Shang Qinghua will surely abandon him (┬┬﹏┬┬) Wait, Shang-shidi didn't abandon him? And he's defending him in front of their marital sibling?（⊙ｏ⊙）
- He has a friend, he has a friend, he has a FRIEND!
- My FRIEND wants to go on a mission with me, not because he really needs me but because he wants me to!
- Liu Qingge is apologizing to me? Is this a qi deviation? Was he replaced by an impostor? Oh. Shang-shidi defended me? Oh.
- Shang-shidi is being nice to me! Shang-shidi is friend. Must show that he appreciates their friendship. Now what would make a good gift? Oh, he knows! Even if he has to suffer the brute's presence, he will obtain this item! *uses LQG's guilt to blackmail him into a coffee finding expedition*
- FEELS, so many FEELS. Ha! He accepted my friendship gift, that means no returns or exchanges!
- *goes on a manhunt to ensure SQH's happiness* *recruits Zhou Chunhua because she's legitimately scary and their goals align* Happy ending.

The Mission for Coffee
SQQ & LQG going on the mission:
SQQ: *sits on a rock fanning himself*
LQG, meanwhile: *fights against a horde of demonic beasts*
SQQ to SQH, later: What, like it's hard.

OMAKE
Unbeknownst to Shang Qinghua, he did write coffee in PIDW. In one of the demonic feast scenes after Luo Binghe conquers the world and becomes the emperor, one of his wives (wife #126, a Northern ice demoness) is mentioned to be sipping on a mocha Frappuccino. The only reason Shang Qinghua doesn’t remember any negative feedback is because the orgy scene that followed was so atrociously bad that Peerless Cucumber went over the character limit on his comment.

OMAKE (not canon): The Problem of Luo Binghe
During the disciple selection, SQQ notices that SQH is interested in LBH so he gift-wraps LBH and tosses him to An Ding Peak. SQH is uncertain if he should be thankful or if he should pack up and flee at the first occasion.
column9: Thank you B for beta-ing!
column10:

- What?（⊙ｏ⊙） Who would've expected SQH to hold such thoughts. Hmm. Of course, I'm the best. Interest peaked.
- He smiled at me! He looked happy to see me! o(*°▽°*)o Hmm. Suspicious. ಠ_ಠ Must investigate more.
- Hmm Shang-shidi has some hidden depths... Did I make a friend?

column4:
After dying from a fever and having his body inhabited by an angry modern man, Shen Qingqiu found himself not in the purgatory but in front of a customer service counter.

“In the Rebirth Company… we offer you a chance to be reborn into different worlds and play different roles!” The terrified intern shrieked. "So please spare me, dear customer!"

Oh well. How bad can it be?

In which Original Shen Qingqiu becomes a transmigrator himself, and goes around to ruin every plotlines.

Arc 1: Cinderella AU
Arc 2: Beauty & The Beast AU
Arc 3: Sleeping Beauty AU
Arc 4: MDZS AU
Arc 5: Snow White AU
Arc 6: Hansel and Gretel AU
Arc 7: Puss in Boots AU
Arc 8: The Little Mermaid AU
Arc 9: Kimi wa Pet AU

Tags will be updated later~

column4:
In which, the one who died in the Spirit Cave was Shen Qingqiu. Liu Qingge was left to pick up the pieces and tried to atone to his guilt of accidentally killing his shixiong who turned out... to be actually different than he ever thought of before.

The daily journals in the cabinet left by Shen Qingqiu cleared up many confusions. Liu Qingge found himself learning to be a better teacher and falling in love with someone who was not in this world anymore...

And Luo Binghe learned why his Shizun had always been unfair to him... Or had he really?
column6: I'm a trash. This is actually light-hearted. Because I didn't feel the suffocation in my chest whilst writing this. Sure, Shen Jiu died at the start and that's depressing enough, but the rest was about Liu Qingge picking up the pieces and learned to shape his own life... Also falling in love to someone who already died.

warnings include pregnancy loss, stillbirth, violence, depression, suicidal thoughts, infidelity/cheating, power imbalance, discussions of abortion

yqy... is not the best husband here, but i think thats fair.

column7:
I considered calling this "Snorting Ambien Off A Hooker's Ass" but I tragically didn't have the guts in the end. Not beta'd.

I have this set in a gap of time before Shen Jiu got named successor of his peak because he got there later so I figured he got named a little later than YQY and LQG.

YQY goes back and forth between calling SJ 'Shen Jiu' and calling him 'Xiao-Jiu' because he's trying to respect SJ's wishes and boundaries but in this fic he's real bad at that, so he forgets or gets emotional and goes back to 'Xiao-Jiu'. Fun fact, guy only calls himself Yue Qingyan and not Yue Qi because he's flat out disassociating most of this time. These two are paragons of emotional health.

column2: behind a clock no longer chiming
column4:
Shen Qingqiu had been certain, the night before, as he’d let himself drift, that he would never wake again. Instead, he was awake. He could feel sunlight on his face. He had all his limbs, and the bed was soft, and there was no pain save, perhaps, the deep, pleasant burn of muscles well-exercised.

And there was a hand touching him.


After his death as Luo Binghe’s prisoner, the original Shen Qingqiu wakes up in Scum Villain’s universe, in the same body Shen Yuan trasmigrated into. A body Shen Yuan has not vacated.

Faced with a world in which all it took for his sect to thrive, for Yue Qingyuan to live and for Luo Binghe to avoid turning into the scourge of the realms was for someone to take his place and live his life in his stead, Shen Jiu finds himself having to confront old hurts, his own accountability and the inevitability of human (and demonic) nature.

column4: For a lifetime of bad choices, Yue Qingyuan decides to bet everything on this one: to keep Shen Jiu by his side, or die trying.
column5: [['For faelicy.', ['faelicy', '/users/faelicy/gifts']], ['Translation into Русский available: И ты даже не знаешь, что я тебя ждал by MXTX_novels', ['И ты даже не знаешь, что я тебя ждал', '/works/20465828'], ['MXTX_novels', '/users/MXTX_novels/pseuds/MXTX_novels']]]
column6:
The fic presupposes the possibility that YQY could have made a different choice: one that would have averted the tragedy that is Proud Immortal Demon Way. Although I love to joke often that YQY is the root of all evil in the original, it’s sad but true. His actions precipitated all that happens, from start to finish, neatly delineated in the cursed extra containing his and SJ’s backstory. He kept making poor choices and eventually, things escalated to this point, so I wondered, is there a way to turn it around. And if so, when? In order for this to exist, he had to make a different choice and everything that changes alongside it was a fun exercise. Hopefully, people would derive some enjoyment out of it. All hatemail goes to faelicy (my beta) for enabling this.

The title is from this song. Lyrics. Thanks, darling Tan.
column7: In closing, thanks to all my PAPAPA server bros for enabling and cheering me on while dealing with [redacted due to not being fit for human eyes] and providing brain juice and entertainment as I worked on this. To faelicy, without whose endless thirst for pain and suffering, this would not have existed. And also for all the invaluable editing help she provided, in return. Thanks for reading.

“Have you heard? The Qing Jing Peak guest disciple has proposed marriage to his shizun!”

Shen Qingqiu accepts a demonic disciple into his fold, and comes to regret it years down the road.
column6:
so this fic was inspired by the five million moshang fics of sqh completely misunderstanding mbj proposing to marry him + demon courtship, except i wanted it for bingjiu, but then before i could make a proper romcom i’d have to literally retcon their whole relationship. (why do i DO this to myself, really, i could have just popped the backstory in like, three paragraphs but nooo). So here we are! SJ somehow making LBH fall in love with him without knowing it, because it turns out demons express affection in a completely different manner. (Beat him up three times a day, SQQ~!)

written for #BingJiuWeek2020. bingjiu is actually my favorite sv ship and yet somehow this is the first fic i'm posting for them hihi.

column4: When Yue Qingyuan is hit by a sleeping curse, the entirety of Cang Qiong Mountain falls into chaos and disarray. Which is really helpful for absolutely nobody, Shen-shixiong, so why don’t you just let your shidi work? You don’t even like Zhangmen-shixiong???

column2: Shen Jiu and The Very Bad, No Good, Absolutely Terrible First Life
column4:
Qi’ge looked at him, stood next to him, spoke to him, but didn’t see him and Shen Jiu wanted to scream, rage, cry at the injustice of the world.

He had finally reunited with his precious Qi’ge, but the price of the reunion made him wish he had burnt in the fire with the rest of that damned household.

And yes, yes, I absolutely love Royal AUs, but I also totally have a thing for SY turning into that strong and aloof (his ass) cultivator so we're gonna do both!

column2: it was a grave yet bore no stone
column4:
“This is a very dangerous secret to know,” All Might warns them. “It’s not something to be treated lightly. It’s better to know all of it than to just guess pieces.”

“What, exactly, is the secret, sensei?” Asui asks, ever the brave one.

“One for All.”

It takes one small accident—leaving too much information out with a class of curious students. It was supposed to be a normal weekend, but weekends are never normal when you're a hero in training. Class 1-A just happens to stumble upon the biggest kept secret in the last 200 years.

also known as: Class 1-A finds out about One for All

column4:
“Thoughts, Coulson?” Fury asked, finger tapping idly on Barton’s file.

“He’s dangerous. He has trust issues that we may not be able to breach, he will not like working with others, he will lie to us about his motivations every chance he gets and, most likely, be successful every time.” Coulson’s gaze drifted back to the empty chair Barton had chosen earlier, boxed in the corner yet protected on as many sides as possible. “It won’t be easy, but if we can win his loyalty he has the potential to be the asset we’re looking for.”

Fury agreed, though neither of them would ever dream that they already had Barton’s loyalty, or that the price it cost was so steep.

 

*Do Not post/upload this story to other websites.*

Now with POD!FIC by Liannabob!! YAY! see notes for link!
column6:
POD!FIC Liannabob has graciously given voice to these words! A lot of voice, like 6 hours of fabulous voicing!! She's done such a fantastic job and I am ecstatic that she enjoyed this story enough to honour it this way! So if you take a listen (which you should!) please drop her major kudos!!

Through The Glass [PODFIC]

 Big thanks to Allochthon, Zarannya, Red Tigress, Cariadne, and feelschat for their editing and support! As is expected all mistakes you still find are mine. I’m rather possessive about them.

This was written in response to two prompts. Story Spoilers: one was based on the request that Clint was an indentured servant to SHIELD, but nobody in SHIELD (ex: Coulson, Fury, etc) know about his circumstances. And also: a truth collar. It’s in there, I promise.
* I do Not give my permission to re-post/upload this work on other sites with the exception of my own account on fanfic.net.*

column2: The Penny Drops, The Penny Dreads
column4:
Jason’s background as a victim of abuse and childhood homelessness means it’s hard for him to trust, and to ask for things. After only a couple months in the manor, he still isn’t sure about Bruce Wayne.
___

When you come from nothing, it’s hard to adjust to having everything.

column2: why can't the past just die
column4:
Every Monday, Peter Parker calls his social worker and asks the same question.

"Did you find a foster home that is willing to take in six kids?"

After a year of receiving the same answer, Peter has resigned himself to a life of avoiding his strict foster father, looking out for his brothers, and counting down the days between visitation with his other brother and sisters, all while trying to navigate new powers he doesn't fully understand. Peter has almost given up hope of getting all his siblings under the same roof, until he spots an article on his Twitter feed: "STARKS LOOKING TO EXPAND THEIR FAMILY THROUGH FOSTER CARE."

Will a long-buried family secret and a sob story be enough to reunite the Parker siblings?

column2: Itachi: On the Importance of Communication
column4: Series of funny and cute incidences centered around language barriers and two vastly different cultures trying to understand one another. At least they're fairly certain he isn't out to kill them.
column6:
[Editing By- Igornerd, GwendolynStacy, Duesal Bladesinger, darkerdeepdown, To Mockingbird, Monster Cat Music Girl, LiteSadistofElements]

Well... I'm a firm believer in being able to drop Itachi in just about any universe and end up with something awesome. And this is what happened. (It was either Lord of the Rings or My Little Pony, I may still write an MLP Itachi-insert later though.)

Warning:It's going to jump around a lot. This is the much condensed version of a far longer epic story that I have entirely too little time to even dream of writing. It's just a collection of scenes from a much longer story that my friends (see editors above) insisted I post for the world to enjoy.

So here you go, enjoy.
column7: So... that's that. Thank you for reading my experimentation in trans-dimensional Uchiha-ness. I had a few other ideas for scenes, but this had been sitting around for probably about two or three years before I finally just buckled down and finished the scenes I had already started. If I ever get around to writing them I'll post them as another chapter to this, but I'm not sure how likely that is to happen.

column4:
hey
omg that delivered
you’re right, Stark phones are far superior
or is it just this particular one you gave me

 

 

Tony stares at his phone as the messages come in, and he narrows his eyes. He shifts a little on the couch, glances at Pepper.

“What?” she asks, catching his eye. She looks down at his phone. “What did Peter do?”

“Do I have a Peter face?” Tony asks. “Peter in danger expression?”

“I don’t know,” Pepper says. “Is he in danger?”

Tony sighs. “I hope not, but I’m—I’m not optimistic.”

column2: for us, child, the stars refuse to shine
column4:
“Stay down,” Stark demanded and pressed an iron hand against his shoulder, as if Peter was even entertaining the notion of standing. “That was a nasty spill, kid. FRIDAY says you’ve got a concussion and a couple broken ribs. We need to get you back to the Tower, have Medical check you out–“

“No!” Peter’s eyes flew open. Tony looked down at him, frowning with equal parts guilt, concern, and confusion. “I mean, uh – that’s just – not necessary. I have super healing. Radioactive spider bite, remember? Give me five minutes.”

More like five hours – but no way in hell was he going to tell Stark that.

A medical examination at Avengers Tower might mean taking blood and DNA samples.

Blood and DNA samples would reveal, clear as day, Spider-Man’s crippling addiction to heroin.

-----

When the Avengers stumble upon Peter Parker, he is not a fifteen year old, bubbly, nerdy high school student. He is eighteen, homeless, and a drug addict.

Peter refuses to let them discover the squalor he lives in when the mask is off, refuses to ruin their perfect little makeshift family with all his dirt, refuses to get too close.

Unfortunately, he doesn't really have a choice.

column4:
“Hey, Mister Stark,” Peter said, ducking back into the bathroom. “What’s up?”

“What’s up?” Tony repeated. “What’s up?”

Yeah, Peter thought, I’m dead.

“Would you like to enlighten me, then?” asked his mentor. “Care to tell me what is up? Because, as far as I know, you’re supposed to be dead. As far as I know, the entire city has stopped functioning because you literally died.”

Peter grimaced and leaned his head back against the wall. “Uh—surprise?”

or

One morning, Peter wakes up to find that he's gone viral. And he’s dead.

column4:
“I thought you were my intern,” Tony says.

“Well, yeah, but it’s not like official or anything,” Peter reasons. “I can’t exactly put Spider-Man on my resume. Miss Potts had me fill out paperwork and everything.”

“Oh, well—paperwork. Very fancy. And what exactly are you doing for this ‘official internship’?” Tony asks, pouring himself a much needed cup of coffee.

“Um, she has me doing some marketing stuff.”

Tony spins around, sloshing coffee everywhere, his eyebrows shooting upward. “Marketing?”

column2: Peter Parker's home for wayward people and animals
column4:
Peter Parker. 16 years old. Recently emancipated from the foster system and moved into the dingy villa his deceased parents left him. Which apparently means he has to deal with various stray animals and human beings who keep choosing his house as their refuge. He is so unprepared for this shit.
And then stupid Tony Stark randomly decides to insert himself into Peter’s life, with his dad-sweaters and his boo-boo fixing and his casseroles.
He thinks Peter’s parents are just out of town on a business trip. Peter is in no mood to correct him.

column4:
Remaining neutral about Eddie Brock was much easier in principle when he’s the unseen ex of your girlfriend, a little harder in practise when you’ve helped him through the worst week of his life.

“Pay up.” Anne flops down next to him on the couch two months later. They’re still fishing bits of the Life Foundation Rocket out of the Pacific, but no evil or chaotic neutral ex-terrestrial goo has been recovered. Supposedly.

Dan fishes the promised $20 out of his wallet, “He finally told you.”
-

Dr Dan Lewis would like to stop feeling like the third billed in the romantic comedy that is his life.

column2: All good things come in threes
column4:
“I know all about your secret identity.”
A beat of silence. “Um,” Peter said, bunching his sweater in his hands. “Which… which one?”
--
Peter has three secret identities: Spider-Man, the superhero who swings around the city to save people. Parker Benjamin, who gives Tony Stark unsolicited advice on his research. And NightMonkey, the Instagrammer who keeps uploading increasingly popular but embarrassing drawings of Iron Man.
And he can juggle them all just fine, thankyouverymuch.

column2: Aliens, Hammers, and Making a Memorable First Impression
column4:
"Wow, dude, this thing is awesome. Does it generate its own electricity?" Peter flipped the hammer once in the air and caught it, watching in amazement as sparks danced over it. "Like, I know you're the god of thunder, but I didn't know your hammer had magic powers too! That is so cool. I want one. Like, I won't get it, obviously, 'cause I don't want to steal your thunder—no pun intended.”

He grinned at his totally-intended pun, but Thor didn't react. Not even a twitch of the lips.

“Okay, yeah, that was a dumb joke,” Peter admitted. “Sorry. Here's your hammer, Mr. Thor.” He held out the weapon to its rightful owner.

Thor just stared.

 

(Peter Parker meets Thor for the first time. It does not go as expected.)

column4:
Oto would thrive here, taking in the abandoned, the mocked, the feared, giving those rejected by society through no fault of their own dignity, purpose, and belonging.
In short, Orochimaru gets reincarnated into BNHA with his most valuable *cough* precious *cough* people, and the LoV never quite gets off the ground because Orochimaru keeps poaching the talent. And there's Kabuto. He takes Mineta's place in 1-A by teaming up with Izuku in the Entrance exams (You hit stuff and break both the robots and your bones, and I'll heal the bones for you so you can keep breaking them) bonds with Izuku through their shared love of analysis, and really just wants to dissect something.
On the bright side, no pervy grapes peeking on the girl's bodies. On the other hand, Kabuto is technically interested in their bodies as well, but at least he's reformed and respectful.
column7:
No Kabuto, these aren't Konohan Chuunin exams, you aren't supposed to be tested on your teamwork, stop overthinking things. Also, obfuscating your actual abilities is a good thing, but why did you have to bite your thumb? Summoning has done strange things to your definitions of self harm.
It's rather ironic that a village of mercenaries and child soldiers emphasize teamwork and cooperation more than heroes do.
And, note the capitalizations. Kabuto says "quirk", not "Quirk". Nedzu and Kabuto say "biomanipulation", Izuku thinks "Biomanipulation". Neither of the two white-haired/furred people think Kabuto actually is just a biomanipulator.

column2: Of Quirks, Dwarves, One For All and Arkenstone
column4:
Bilbo Baggins, gentle-hobbit of Hobbiton-across-the-Water, and Midoriya Izuku, quirkless kid in a world where most people have superpowers, woke up in each other's figurative shoes one fine morning.

The two worlds would never be the same.
column6:
First and foremost, some initial disclaimers/general notice:

1) First thing first: All disclaimers apply. The Hobbit, The Silmarillion and all related work were the property of The Good Professor and presently belongs to The Tolkien Estate. Boku no Hero Academia belongs to the ingenious Kohei Horikoshi - may he always live up to the motto of the academy of his own making!

2) Fanboy declaration: While, to borrow a famous hobbit's turn of phrase, I have unfortunately read less than half as much as I would have liked and of these works liked less than half as much of all protagonists less than they are meant to be, the moment I got to read BnHA and got acquainted to a certain Midoriya Izuku I knew I'd met the one of, if not the, most awe-inspiring (and inspiring period!) character I've ever known. There is perhaps little I can do to Deku's character that has not been done before and better, but I'd like to at least try.

3) A few notes on language and timeline:
- Names are written in the Japanese order in scenes where Deku is the viewpoint character (so "Baggins Bilbo", "Sackville-Baggins Lobelia", "Gamgee Hamfast"), in the Western order in scenes where Bilbo is the viewpoint character (so "Izuku Midoriya", "Katsuki Bakugou", "Shouto Todoroki"), and in their 'correct' respective order in scenes taken over by the omniscient narrator.
- The deaths of Bungo and Belladonna Baggins are moved back by five years each, so Bungo passed away in T.A. 2921 and Belladonna in T.A. 2929. The births of Hamfast Gamgee and his wife are similarly moved back, to T.A. 2916.

4) This story is now available on SpaceBattles: https://forums.spacebattles.com/threads/of-quirks-dwarves-one-for-all-and-arkenstone-the-hobbit-my-hero-academia.646562/

With no further ado, do enjoy your stay here - I do hope you'll enjoy reading my work as I have writing it.

column4:
(Post Winter Soldier mainly because I want Bucky to be here for this.)

"Sounds simple enough," Tony drawls, arching a sceptical eyebrow. "A week-long mission just for a little book from a 50-year old man? You're losing your touch, eyepatch."

Fury ignores the obvious jab, but he does answer the man's smirk with a little one of his own. Something squirms in Steve's gut, like undigested worms. "A.Z. Fell's have a bit of a...reputation."

column4: Everyone knew Matilda was a rather extraordinary child, but even she didn't know she was a witch. Matilda Honey receives her Hogwarts letter in the year of the Triwizard Tournament, and soon, she will leave her unique mark on the magical world.
column5: [['For Super Carlin Brothers.', ['Super Carlin Brothers', '/gifts?recipient=Super+Carlin+Brothers']]]
column6:
Disclaimer: Harry Potter belongs to JK Rowling, and Matilda belongs to Roald Dahl…or maybe his estate? I didn’t bother to look it up.

Part of this chapter is quoted from Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.

This story was written for the Super Carlin Brothers’ “Celebrate Your Fandom” week. Big thanks to my co-author, DaughteroftheOneTrueKing aka JustARatherVerySillyWriter, for helping to make this story a reality.

I’ve wanted to write a Harry Potter/Matilda crossover for a while. I’d like to see a full-length story, but I don’t think I’m the one to do that. I finally found a good idea for a novella, though, and we decided to write it up.
The story here is that Matilda Honey (formerly Matilda Wormwood) from the Roald Dahl story is a witch and (obviously) goes to Hogwarts. Based on the publication date of the book, she arrives in Harry’s fourth year, and hilarity ensues.

Note that while I’m setting this in Britain like the book, this story will otherwise be based on the movie, since that has more magic in it and is better in my opinion. As a novella-length story, this will most be the highlights of Matilda’s time at Hogwarts. If anyone wants to fill in the gaps and expand it into something full-length, be our guest.

column4: Orochimaru took a walk and somehow managed to launch himself into space.
column7:
So, hello there!
I'm usually not explaining stuff in the notes, but I think there is a certain part of this fic that would raise all sort of questions. So I've decided to explain it.

As you've probably noticed, Orochimaru's relationship with gender is... well. It is canon that at least at one point during the series he was walking around in a female body and was totally fine with it. Not too long ago it was also confirmed in Boruto manga, that Orochimaru likes to change the way he looks, switching between more male-ish version of himself and the very feminine-like looks from Boruto (at least according to the images.)
So. Jack deciding that this new person is a woman? Not a joke. Orochimaru is wearing what he finds more comfortable at the moment. I doubt that he gives a crap about pronouns either - whatever is fine, as long as his name is recognized and used correctly.

I also like to believe that he's currently using Zetsu as his body- either the same one he took over during the final part of the manga (Hashirama cells were supposed to regenerate easily, so it should withstand Orochimaru's presence inside much better than any human) or one he cloned for himself. It's much easier this way than pissing everyone by hunting down a powerful shinobi time after time.

Um, yeah. This is what I'm rolling with when writing Orochimaru.

Edit: The canon enabled me more than I was expecting.

column2: Winry Rockbell and the Wizard Rebels
column4:
Ed has gone missing while on a research trip. Lucky for him, Winry installed a tracking device in his leg automail after Promised Day and decides to go looking for him. On her quest, she stumbles upon Wizard London.

Set during the summer before Harry’s fifth year (a few weeks before the dementor attack), and after FMAB.
column6: Ed has alchemy and one automail limb (his leg). Ed stayed a State Alchemist, but still went West while Al went East like at the end of Brotherhood. He and Winry are engaged and haven’t seen each other since the proposal but they send letters back and forth and call each other all the time.

column4:
“They took food but not you?” the lord huffs, his voice is verging on anger again.
“Yes,” Tommy says hesitantly, “yessir.” It can’t be good, telling the lord, the conqueror, just how useless he is. So much so that the other servants wouldn’t even bother unchaining him to help carry food. He wasn’t worth what he could carry, not even temporarily.
The lord grunts again.
Tommy hates having him at his back, but he goes to the pantry, piecing together the bits of food that are left. Most of it is gone, but there are a few things tucked into corners that he assembles. “Sir?”
The lord grunts, turning away from where he was examining a dented cooking pot.
“Would you like some wine?”
“Wine,” the lord says as if the word were unfamiliar.
Perhaps it is? He is foreign. His accent isn’t very heavy, but it is still present. No, he speaks well, surely he knows what wine is.
column6:
This is not the end of the drought, this is like that one light rainstorm that gives you hope that the drought is gonna be over but then nothing comes after it for awhile. I just felt like posting this morning to make sure you guys didn't starve. Expect updates to be slow and sporadic for a bit, I've been going through some health shit this month and generally felling like Crap for awhile so I've not been writing much.

CONTENT WARNING:
Underage drinking with help from an adult: Wilbur while drunk heavily encourages (somewhat forces) Tommy to drink wine because wine and good decisions are not besties. If that's the sort of thing that disturbs you then this is not the fic for you.
There is also mention of dead bodies and some blood shown but nothing graphic
column7:
Techno had no fucking clue what Tommy meant by wine. He just went with it. They all learned the language from books and from speaking to a few people who spoke it in the empire, they had no reason to learn the word for wine.
Obviously they figured out what it was when they tasted it, and Techno was like "ew gross" but Phil and Wilbur had no idea how strong it was and well.

I hope you all enjoyed! This was mostly just a bit of fun that I felt like writing. Mostly a warmup that got out of hand lol ((I have posted some more warm ups on my tumblr if you guys wanted to read those) Again, it'll probably be awhile before I post again.
I'm for sure gonna be posting on like Jan 2 cause that's when a Secret Santa fic is due and that has nine chapters (it was supposed to be a oneshot, again.) and I have a couple other oneshots that I might sprinkle through but mostly I've just been feeling crappy so I don't have much *to* post. Hopefully that's gonna improve soon though!

 

Things that will get your comment deleted:
1) Pointing out typos and grammar shit. I do not care, I've got dyslexia, I get all the stuff out that I can, unless the typo is altering the meaning of a sentence, just live with it.

2) Talking about how you don't like the content of a fic. You are free and welcome to use the back button if you don't like the fic, I encourage it, but I don't want to hear about how you dislike it. I wrote this for me, you guys get to read it because I'm nice. These are comments, not reviews.

3) Asking me to write other stuff. I have never taken requests and I likely won't ever do so. I write what I want to.

4) Comments about rape or suicide. I really shouldn't have to say this, but here we are. Unless there is suicide in the themes of a fic, I don't want to hear it, and I never want to hear about rape. Ever. Or sexual content in general, thanks.

You can find me on tumblr at technobladesbasement

If you're inspired to create anything based on my fics, art, writing, interperative dance you have full permission to do it. Inspiring other people to do stuff is my favorite thing.

I love comments but I am shit at replying to them, sometimes Maddie or Zambo will reply for me because they are blessed, wonderful people who know I have so much anxiety. So much. but I love all comments regardless and I thank everyone who leaves me one, they brighten my day

column4:
“Y’just need to ask him out, mate.”

“No. It wouldn’t work. Neither of us have any time and it would be a distraction from our jobs and the press would turn it into a big scandal…”

Piers stuck another cigarette between his lips.

“Never took you for a coward, Raihan.”

It's time for the Galar Gym Challenge and Raihan has a gym to run, but Raihan is determined to tell Leon how he feels. Nothing, not the press, not the Chairman, not even an apocalyptic pokemon is going to get in his way. However, the best laid plans of meowth and men often go awry...

column4:
“What will?” Wei Ying asks again, overwhelmingly innocent. “Hanguang-jun? I think you should let me go… Maybe we can talk later? Tomorrow we’ll all go to the Cloud Recesses—you’ll be there, won’t you? So whatever you wanted to do...”

Cute. He is trying to make himself smaller in Lan Wangji’s grip, obvious in his attempts—perhaps thinking that the noble Hanguang-jun would never take advantage of something small and helpless.
column6:
You ever just realize you've been sitting on 6k of porn forever? Anyway, thank you to Trisha for beta reading this monster of a pwp, you are my champion.

The title was taken from a poem by Elizabeth Hewer, from her collection, Wishing for Birds.

Additional Warnings (SPOILERS): This is a fantasy facilitated by the incense burner, based on a dream of Wei Wuxian's. It is heavily implied that Wei Wuxian is underage, while Lan Wangji is obviously an adult. 3515 was the inspiration for this fic, but those specific ages are not stated in the text; feel free to imagine what you will. This is a rape fantasy that plays out as dubious consent, so if that is uncomfortable to you, please do not read this fic. Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji are both heavily enjoying themselves, but the content may still be triggering—be safe. Last but not least, there is a mention of noncon spanking, but no spanking actually occurs.

column4:
“Todoroki, you’re a dick,” Kaminari has no sense of self-preservation, the idiot. Why is Eijirou only surrounded by assholes and morons these days? “Also, that guy just demolished about seventy percent of the street. Why aren’t you freezing him yet?”

The half-cold half-hot hero squints at the villain on top of a fallen building. “He’s just…standing there. Isn’t it against the hero policy to attack someone who is incapable of fighting back?”

----

The one where Izuku skipped UA and went to infiltrate the villain alliance instead, got All for One, and destroyed it three days before Katsuki's nineteenth birthday. All within plan. Except, Kacchan ruined that when he showed up with his friends right after Izuku dealt the last blow.
column7:
the idea comes from the tumblr post where the friends-to-enemies trope is used and instead of peppered with angst, it's all about inside jokes and petty comebacks of the international scale. obviously, izuku is no petty criminal material so he turns to vigilantism and katsuki catches him the FIRST TIME he does something really big because i'm weak and cannot deal with them dragging the fighting out.

i just want katsuki's friends to see him scolding his wayward villainous childhood friend. that's it, really.
